title: Self-Assessment Simulation Education to Improve HBOC Risk Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary genetics concepts and basic understanding of cancer development mechanisms
context.additional_context: Implementation of a simulation environment to enhance risk awareness competencies for Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome (HBOC) among professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, utilizing VR-based virtual patient consultation scenarios and self-assessment tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify and document HBOC risk factors (personal/family history) with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can perform self-assessments using risk evaluation tools in VR simulations with a consecutive success rate of 80% or higher over three attempts.
Learners can recommend appropriate genetic testing/counseling services with 100% accuracy after interpreting risk level results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
